channel.title: Offering $5 to anyone who can fix!
channel.description:
Hello, i am trying to add anims for some of the weapon specs i have like d claws, vesta longsword, and statius warhammer. My msn - trentsdoucet@hotmail.com I would appreciate if someone could help me. I am also having trrouble adding chaotics and sol. when i add sol and spawn it my client freezes up.
Offering $5 via paypal if anyone can help me fix. I have team viewer and skype. And also msn - trentsdoucet@hotmail.com
